main event: At approximately 9:15 PM CST on November 15, 1961, residents in Mackinaw, Illinois observed a bright light in the sky that broke into multiple parts before fading from view.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 3-4 minutes,The object was observed to break up into 12 or more smaller lights which flickered and faded,The witnesses were experienced jet engine mechanics with good reliability estimates, The direction of the object's travel was generally east, The investigation suggested the lights might have been related to a tanker plane making refueling runs in the area.
sighted object: a bright light that broke into multiple smaller lights
witness description: two jet engine mechanics and a farmer
